mapper.select: SELECT E.etp_num etpNum,to_char(rsv_start_date,'HH24') timeSet, count(*) countNum FROM ENTERPRISE E, RESERVATION R WHERE etp_ADDRESS LIKE '%강서구%' AND E.etp_num = R.etp_num and E.etp_email = R.etp_email group by to_char(rsv_start_date,'HH24'),E.etp_num order by to_char(rsv_start_date,'HH24')
